list.name: Default
list.comment: [#163] Changes to allow left and right header images to change randomly based on a set of images stored in a named folder. Change complete and basic testing complete.

task.summary: Default task
[#2] Enhancing functionality of edit page to include a heading line and first 40 characters of the text etc. Not finished yet.
[#4] More work on Edit Index page. A bit of formatting and inclusion of the first 40 characters of the page contents field.
[#11] Changes to implement enabled flag in view and edit pages.
[#11 state:resolved][#4 state:resolved] Complete initial implementation of edit page and add page.

[#5 state:resolved][#6 state:resolved][#8 state:resolved][#9 state:resolved] - Implemented code to generate linkbars for pages of given Category (Mistress or Chambers) - Replaced current hard coded header include files with dynamically generate linkbars - Implemented the name of the home page as a servlet context init parameter. - Created method to calculate a link to the home page

[#8] Added code to read flag for a screen to check whether it is a gallery page. If so the appropriate folder is parsed and any images have a thumbnail created unless the thumbnail already exists. A thumbnail table is added to the end of the page.
This is a first pass. The flag isn't reflected in the edit and update pages yet. Quite a lot of code written to create the thumbnails and manipulate the files in the folder and create the html to represent the thumbnail table.
Started a bit of general re-factoring and cleaning up. Still quite a lot to do.
[#10] Got automatic thumbnails working and gallery display. Still need to update screen edit page to allow gallery configuration flag to be set.
[#10] Updated so gallery flag appears and can be edited (editIndex, add and edit)

[#16] More work on refactoring. Am replacing the long if then else sequence in doGet and doPost with instantiations of subclasses of ActionClass. This will simplify the logic and create a more homogeneous approach to dealing with different types of request. Not sure it is right but I am sure I am moving in the right direction.
Need to think how I will deal with the fact that some requests result in a redirection - where should this logic be implemented?

[#16] Have completed this round of re-factoring. All the methods to process the request strings have been replaced by instantiations of an object (subclass of ActionClass). A couple of notes:
- The setting of the redirect flag is still hard coded within the if then else loop in doGet / doPost in ControllerHelper. I need to delegate this to the ActionClass subClasses.
- Because I moved the code out of the ControllerHelper the way the data object was populated within the UpdateScreenAction class didn't work because data was passed in. In fixing this I discovered the BeanUtils class and the populate method. This has opened a whole new world and has helped to increase my understanding of the way Java Beans work. I also believe the code is more cohesive and modular now so I am happy this is going in the right direction although there is a long way to go.

[#24 state:resolved] Modified editIndex.jsp to remove option to delete a page. This is in anticipation of going live and ensuring that pages aren't deleted by mistake. Can us enabled flag to stop pages being displayed and where necessary pages can be deleted through direct database manipulation.

[#19 state:resolved] As it turned out this was a different error from what I thought. The creation of galleries wasn't in the code, there was just a single creation of the chambers gallery which I had put in for test purposes. I fixed by changing the logic so that when trying to get a gallery for the first time it is created then. This seems to work but will do more rigorous testing as part of full testing ticket.

This is a big commit as I haven't been committing as I go which I should have. A number of tickets under the User Acceptance Testing Milestone are fixed here. The code isn't working as I am still in the process of fixing the duplicate screen name issue.
[#32] Lots of changes relating to this ticket. See previous notes for details on changes.

[#36] Fairly basic solution - just added a sort index column manually updated and sort editIndex and linkbars with it. Was a relatively easy change - the hardest bit was remembering how to add a column to a database and then re-generated the JavaBean / hibernated code to encapsulate it.

[#44 state:retest] Easy fix to main.css. I had copied across the css from live site but had changed markup so that the class headerLink was an attribute of the `li` element not the `a` element. Just changed the specifier to take this into account.
[#51 state:resolved] That was an easy one! Just swap round the two calls to the linkbar array in screen.jsp.
[#31] Use Case 1 (Gallery Flag not Enabled). Tested. Fixed problem that gallery tag was part of template so existed even when Gallery not enabled.
[#31] Use Case 2 : Gallery enabled but no gallery folder. `screen.jsp` didn't check for null value of "galleryHTML". Fixed.
[#31] Use Case 3 : Screen Gallery enabled, folder exists but no images. Was a bit fiddly. Had to move logic around so creation of thumbnail and gallery doesn't take place if there are no images.

[#31] Use Case 6: Image changes... Have implemented two flags to say whether to force Gallery Generation on every request, and whether to force Thumbnail Generation whenever a gallery is generated. Have hard coded them to true so that if a file changes, the gallery and thumbnails will be re-generated and the gallery will be correct every time.
In the future this will be replaced by a combination of logic to work out whether a file has changed or not and re-creation of thumbnail based on that, plus the ability to force Gallery/Thumbnail generation through the admin interface.
Clean up commit after a lot of work on IDEA configuration. Just config files - not even sure whether these should be under change control!
Library clean up etc.

[#31] Use Case 8 (Other types of file):
- If the file doesn't have a valid extension (depending upon what is set up, currently jpg and png, it will be stripped out by the list filter in the iterator used to generate thumbnails (or wherever it is!).
- If an invalid file format still has a valid extension, then it should either generate an exception (although this hasn't happened during testing) or generate a null BufferedImage. I just test for that and return false from generateThumbnail and skip that file.
[#29 state:retest] Other use cases work so can retest this ticket. See earlier comments for empty url use case.
[#43] - homePage : Tested : Ok - galleryRoot : Tested : - gallery root of "galleries" was hard coded in one place. Replace with call to `request.getServletContext().getInitParameter("galleryRoot")`.
[#43] Updates relating to re-factoring of gallery parameters.
[#56] Most of these files are relating to getting loggin working in the application with configurable logging level, or getting the Hibernate logging level down.
[#73] More changes to get testing working and make site more consistent between HTML and J2EE to make testing easier
[#73] Subversion problems after renaming folder - trying to fix!

[#73] Continuing refactor of tests plus looking at [#75]
[#73] Continuing refactor of tests plus looking at [#75]
[#75] Quite a lot of changes around admin functions including quite a bit of re-factoring.
Cleanup after going live. Not sure what's in here, I have been a bit lax with commits!
Quite a lot of changes - last thing was a change to the splash page.

Can't remember what these changes are - I must get into the habit of committing more often! The last thing I did was to add the meta description tag to the screen.jsp to get a meta description onto each page.

Implemented changes to implement meta description tag (#95). Also fixed bug which writes a log message containing the screen contents, which fails if the screen text includes a character sequence which can be interpreted as a formatting string.

[#96] Started to implement Configuration as a database table. Got as far as displaying the config items and adding. Still need to edit and read in at startup. Also suggest I add a description field to provide user with help on what type, value etc should be used.
[#96] Added delete item functionality to configuration component.
[#96] Have ended up doing a considerable re-factor as part of this ticket. Not finished yet but this commit is a version which compiles and vaguely works (not fully tested).
[#96] A bit more re-factoring, particularly around database access and the way in which beans are managed. Still quite a lot to do but am making progress.
[#100] Various changes to get a working version again and some changes to galleries (see ticket).

[#100] This commit is to make some changes to the index.html file within the web folder of the app, but actually just after this I have changed the version in the ROOT app so that it doesn't re-direct because it looks like this may impact the SEO potential. This isn't in the project so isn't in the commit.
Just committing to clean up before some structural changes [#133]
Just committing to clean up before some structural changes [#133]
Committing after creating an application which actually runs. See [#131]
Committing after creating an application which actually runs (after adding the moved testing files) See [#131]
Renamed main app source code to webapp - results in a lot of files being moved between old and new folder in subversion. See [#133].
Commit after changes to get app working and consistent with current live. [#136]
Commit after changes to get app working and consistent with current live. [#136]
[#139] Started to add functionality to separate processing for different page types.

[#139] Significant Progress with different screen types. Seems to be working but without significant testing. Have also got testing modules working (although configuration is out of date so tests are failing).

[#139] Significant Progress with different screen types. Seems to be working but without significant testing. Have also got testing modules working (although configuration is out of date so tests are failing).
[#139] Have now got new database column for screen display type working. All seems to work quite well. Needs more testing though!
[#96] Back to getting configuration working. Made a few changes to edit config item functionality. Committing before a big refactor.
[#96] Further progress on configuration. Functionality is working now. Just implementing individual config items. I foresee another round of refactoring to tidy up a bit but is looking fairly good.
[#96] Added a few more configuration item classes and got them working. Noticed that I can't update the value of the primary key - need to detect whether changed and add rather then update.

[#96] Added a few more configuration items. Also got delete functionality working. Have added technical primary key to avoid issues with trying to change the name of an item which was the primary key before.
[#150] Got Gallery functionality working. Whole app needs testing before deployment.
[#152] Deployed app as version #003. Then realised it had some development text in (on titles) so made a quick fix and then deployed again as version #004.

[#145] A lot of changes to implement a new template (mistress-02) which is a new look and feel. I have put this live as version 5. Currently just the contact page configured to use the new template. Am awaiting feedback from Mummy.
Problems with committing so just trying with two images.
Images Only
Lots of changes - too many really so can't assign them to tickets. Lots of work on look and feel of website, galleries etc. Some other things!

[#96] Started checking of config items. Confirmation that homePage is now working. Had to update a few things including changing homePage to homePageLink in ScreenData and all the mistressxx.jsp files.

[#167] [#164] Delivered new background to live (v011) but Mummy didn't like it so have stopped v011 and reverted back to v010 with the first attempt at a background. Have also made a change to mistress-03.css to size mistress top image in mistress pages. This is not live yet but will be part of next release.
Just a bit of tidying up to add the background images and some IDEA files to the repository. I think this is the right thing to do!
